fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Place an hydrant at someone house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the Hydrant triggers, it will roleblock all visitors.
- The Hydrant will trigger if a circumstance is met, chosen by the Plumber at the start of the night.
- The next night, the Hydrant will desactivate and you can put a new one on another person's
- You cannot place an hydrant on the same player's house two nights in a row.

fields.name: What Plumber can choose:
fields.value:
1. If your target gets attacked, your Hydrant will activate.
2. If your target gets roleblocked or controlled, your Hydrant will activate.
3. If any active nighttimes abilities are used on your target, your Hydrant will activate
4.  If your target gets visited by someone suspicious (based on sheriff results), your Hydrant will activate.
